dicts.label: Dictionaries:
dicts.description: Dictionary for the (token-based) manipulator with the same array index.

free.memory.every.description: Number of processed bytes in a continuous corpus after which memory will be freed. If zero, memory will only be freed after processing is complete.

languages.label: Languages:
languages.description: Language for the (token-based aspell) manipulator with the same array index. If no language is set, the default language of the server's aspell configuration will be used.

manipulators.label: Sentence Manipulators:
manipulators.description: Manipulators used to preprocess the text corpus.

models.label: Sentence Models:
models.description: Model for the (sentence-based) manipulator with the same array index.

savepoints.label: Savepoints
savepoints.description: Steps after which the corpus will be stored in the database. Zero means the unmanipulated corpus will be saved. Starting from one, the number corresponds to the manipulators used.
